name: Creamy Mexican Casserole
ingredients: 1/2 pound yellow squash, cut in half moons
1 batch Dottie's Cream of Mushroom Soup for Recipes

instructions.en: Put chicken in a greased 2-quart casserole or baking dish.
Sauté squash in butter until tender-crisp.
Add sautéed squash and half of the cheese to the chicken. Stir to combine.
Mix mushroom soup and enchilada sauce, then blend into the chicken mixture.
Sprinkle remaining cheese over the casserole.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
Top with chopped green onions before serving.

notes: Makes 6 servings. Do not freeze. Dottie's Cream of Mushroom Soup for Recipes is assumed to be a separate recipe.
